raw_text:
A boxed red VNAV ﬂag is shown at the upper end of the vertical deviation scale when VNAV data from the FMS is missing or invalid. The ﬂag ﬂashes for 5 seconds and then changes to a steady-on state.

The VNAV deviation pointer is removed when the VNAV ﬂag is being shown.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 6-7
